data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Toledo, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Toledo, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Toledo, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary: On average, 53 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Toledo, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Toledo, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Toledo.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Kurd, Kurmanji people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kurd, Kurmanji people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kurd, Kurmanji people is yours.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 689,600 people living in the county of Toledo.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Toledo, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary:
the county of Toledo, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain has a population of 689,600.

We estimate Toledo has 11,042 people who might know Jesus, 522,085 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 156,473 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Toledo, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.
